ValidationRule.description: Make the field Root cause / Reject Reason mandatory if a defect status is updated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Fixed"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Validated SIT"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Validate UAT"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Failed Retest"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Monitor"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Closed"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Validate PROD"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Deferred"), ISPICKVAL ( Status__c , "Rejected") ), OR(ISPICKVAL( Root_Cause__c , ""), ISBLANK( Root_Cause_Details__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Root cause / Reject Reason and Details must be entered
